overview: Unskilled, unruly, unwise souls who ends up risking  their lives for a whopping fortune. Admist their big game of crime, they unknowingly befit a threat to an vicious gangster; which ignites the rivalry for acquiring the throne. One who “Wins” will be the  next “Kingpin”. Story on unflinching courage and weapons: “BHASUDI"
title: Bhasudi
